data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Iturbe gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Carlos Gonzalez of Pumas UNAM smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Carlos Gutierrez of Pumas UNAM gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 6, Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Juan Dinenno (Pumas UNAM) has received a yellow card from Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 12, Throw-in high up the field for Pumas UNAM in Mexico City.
Tijuana de Caliente's Clifford Aboagye misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
In the minute 13, Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Important block from the Tijuana de Caliente defence as Juan Dinenno fires in a strike for Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 17, Pumas UNAM's Erik Lira breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM just outside Tijuana de Caliente's area.
In the minute 19, Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo waits before resuming play because Alejandro Mayorga for Pumas UNAM is still down.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alejandro Mayorga returns to the field for Pumas UNAM after picking up a slight injury.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Juan Dinenno for Pumas UNAM gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 31, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Miguel Barbieri is booked for the away team.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 34, Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
In Mexico City Pumas UNAM attack through Carlos Gonzalez. The finish is off target, however.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente close to the penalty box.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Goal! Carlos Gonzalez heads Pumas UNAM into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 38, Johan Vasquez with an assist there.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Pumas UNAM.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 44, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente, close to Pumas UNAM's area.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pablo Guede is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Olimpico Universitario with Edgar Lopez replacing Clifford Aboagye.
In the minute 45, Juan Iturbe (Pumas UNAM) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 46, Pumas UNAM's Carlos Gonzalez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 50, Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Pumas UNAM are caught offside.
At Estadio Olimpico Universitario, Jonathan Orozco has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 52, Carlos Gutierrez (Pumas UNAM) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Alejandro Mayorga gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Pumas UNAM take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Alejandro Mayorga.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 59, Tijuana de Caliente make their second substitution with Jaime Gomez replacing Aldo Cruz.
The away team have replaced Marcel Ruiz with Luis Gamiz. This is the first substitution made today by Pablo Guede.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 60, Andres Lillini (Pumas UNAM) is making a first substitution, with Facundo Waller replacing Carlos Gonzalez.
An attacking Tijuana de Caliente player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Bryan Angulo (Tijuana de Caliente) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
In the minute 65, Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 69, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Carlos Gutierrez for Pumas UNAM who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Pumas UNAM's Carlos Gutierrez is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 73, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Carlos Gutierrez (Pumas UNAM) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Leonel Lopez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tijuana de Caliente are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 76, Jordan Rezabala is replacing Christian Rivera for the away team.
Tijuana de Caliente are whistled for offside.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Alfredo Talavera (Pumas UNAM) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 80, Jordi Cortizo is on a sub for Victor Guzman for Tijuana de Caliente.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 82, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 85, Tijuana de Caliente's Jaime Gomez has been booked in Mexico City.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Tijuana de Caliente needs to be cautious. Pumas UNAM have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 87, Bryan Mendoza is replacing Favio Alvarez for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Brian Figueroa is replacing Juan Iturbe for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Can Pumas UNAM capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tijuana de Caliente's half?
In the minute 89, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Mexico City.
In Mexico City Tijuana de Caliente drive forward through Jordi Cortizo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Brian Figueroa for Pumas UNAM gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
Tijuana de Caliente's Jaime Gomez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Pumas UNAM's Erik Lira breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
That's full-time at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. The final score is 3-0.
Bryan Mendoza puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Bryan Mendoza for Pumas UNAM has been booked by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo and receives a first yellow card.
